StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOsoTrainingStatuses]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SET NOCOUNT ON
CREATE TABLE #OsoOrgTmp ( ORG_ID INT )
IF (@Organiza.onID <> 0) BEGIN INSERT INTO #OsoOrgTmp SELECT ORG_ID FROM MCRISS.USMC.GetOrgHierarchyMinimal(@Organiza.onID) END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO #OsoOrgTmp SELECT NULL AS ORG_ID END
SELECT vw.* FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[vwOsoTrainingStatus] vw INNER JOIN #OsoOrgTmp ot ON ot.ORG_ID = vw.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE vw.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'OSS' AND (vw.BILLET = 'OSO' OR vw.BILLET IS NULL) AND vw.ArchivedDate IS NULL ORDER BY vw.ORGANIZATION_ID
DROP TABLE #OsoOrgTmp
END
